text:
Hi all,

I’m looking to hire an individual who can help me with a few hours of consultancy for setting up HubSpot CMS and the correct workflow.

I have some questions about automated deployments and making the workflow as efficient as possible for my team.

Please reach out to me if you’re an experienced HubSpot CMS Developer who can help me with some consultancy and advice on some questions.

Many thanks :slightly_smiling_face:.
Hi <@U038JB86KAT> - I can help. Anything specific that you are looking for?
